001package com.technototes.library.util;
002
003import static java.lang.annotation.ElementType.TYPE;
004
005import java.lang.annotation.Retention;
006import java.lang.annotation.RetentionPolicy;
007import java.lang.annotation.Target;
008
009import com.qualcomm.robotcore.eventloop.opmode.OpMode;
010
011/**
012 * An enumeration to specify which alliance the bot is on (Red, Blue, or None)
013 */
014public enum Alliance {
015    RED(Color.RED),
016    BLUE(Color.BLUE),
017    NONE(Color.BLACK);
018    Color color;
019
020    /**
021     * Simple constructor from a Color
022     *
023     * @param c
024     */
025    Alliance(Color c) {
026        color = c;
027    }
028
029    /**
030     * Get the alliance color (Red, Blue, or Black)
031     *
032     * @return The *color* for the alliance
033     */
034    public Color getColor() {
035        return color;
036    }
037
038    /**
039     * Select either 'a' or 'b' depending on alliance
040     *
041     * @param a   The item to select if we're red
042     * @param b   The item to select if we're blue
043     * @param <T> The type of a &amp; b
044     * @return a for Red, b for Blue
045     */
046    public <T> T selectOf(T a, T b) {
047        return Selector.selectOf(this, a, b);
048    }
049
050    public static class Selector<T> {
051        private final T r, b;
052
053        protected Selector(T red, T blue) {
054            r = red;
055            b = blue;
056        }
057
058        public T select(Alliance a) {
059            return a == RED ? r : b;
060        }
061
062        public static <T> Selector<T> of(T red, T blue) {
063            return new Selector<>(red, blue);
064        }
065
066        public static <T> T selectOf(Alliance alliance, T red, T blue) {
067            return Selector.of(red, blue).select(alliance);
068        }
069    }
070
071    public static Alliance get(Class<? extends OpMode> c) {
072        if (c.isAnnotationPresent(Red.class)) return RED;
073        if (c.isAnnotationPresent(Blue.class)) return BLUE;
074        return NONE;
075    }
076
077    @Retention(RetentionPolicy.RUNTIME)
078    @Target(TYPE)
079    public @interface Red {
080    }
081
082    @Retention(RetentionPolicy.RUNTIME)
083    @Target(TYPE)
084    public @interface Blue {
085    }
086}
